title: US Declares Energy Emergency as Cold Snap Hits Northeast
description: Four northeastern US states are under emergency transport orders after an outage at one of the largest underground heating fuel storage facilities in the region threatened to disrupt deliveries during a severe cold snap.
content: Four northeastern US states are under emergency transport orders after an outage at one of the largest underground heating fuel storage facilities in the region threatened to disrupt deliveries during a severe cold snap.
